title: Police renew town shooting appeal
content:
Police have renewed an appeal for information after a man was shot in a Nottinghamshire town. 

The 37-year-old victim was shot on Thursday evening in Thoresby Close, Harworth. 

He is currently being treated in hospital for his injuries, which are not thought to be life-threatening, Nottinghamshire Police said. 

Three men arrested on suspicion of attempted murder have been bailed pending further enquires. 

The force is urging anyone who has information about the incident to get in touch.
